location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'PERSIAN GULF: Sketch of APPROACHES TO KUWAIT HARBOUR AND SHATT AL ARAB'

mods.abstract: The map shows the channels of the 'Shatt al Arab or Basra River' and their depths with soundings in fathoms. The map indicates hydrology and settlements, with brief descriptions of topography and vegetation. A key indicates lighting in the waterways (fixed and flashing) and gravel, mud, rock, sand, shells and stones.The map bears the sketch of a compass showing magnetic north.The map bears the following statement: 'Issued for Fleet purposes, 2nd June 1902, large corrections, December 1904, July 1907.'
